StratmasClient.treeview2
Class TreeViewModel

java.lang.Object
  StratmasClient.treeview2.TreeViewModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, TreeModel, StratmasEventListener
public class TreeViewModel
extends Object
implements TreeModel, StratmasEventListener

TreeViewModel is a model adapting the StratmasObject hierarchy to JTree requirements.

          Creates a new TreeViewModel with the specified root.

listen

public StratmasObject listen(StratmasObject stratmasObject,
                             int index)
Begins to listen to the provided StratmasObject if it is not already listened to. Returns the object as a convinience. Note that we only need to listen to non-leaf objects since childChanged takes care of notification of children changes.

Parameters:
stratmasObject - the object
index - the index assigned to the object.
